Monthly Financial Report_Global.requirements: Must include quarterly projections and variance analysis. Data should be sourced from the central data warehouse.
Monthly Financial Report_Global.schedule: Due by 15th of each month. Review meeting scheduled for the 20th.

Weekly Operations Report_EMEA.requirements: Include weekly KPIs and operational metrics for all EMEA branches. Highlight any significant deviations from targets.
Weekly Operations Report_EMEA.schedule: Due every Monday by 10:00 AM local time.

Quarterly Compliance Report_Global.requirements: Must include regulatory compliance checks, internal audit findings, and risk assessments for all regions.
Quarterly Compliance Report_Global.schedule: Due by the last day of each quarter.

Semi-Monthly Audit Report_APAC.requirements: Summarize audit activities and findings for the APAC region. Include progress on remediation efforts.
Semi-Monthly Audit Report_APAC.schedule: Due by the 15th and the last day of each month.

Daily Status Update_NAM.requirements: Brief summary of key activities, achievements, and blockers for the NAM region.
Daily Status Update_NAM.schedule: Due every morning by 9:00 AM local time.
